articles.title: Crypto paper soon, no need to revise growth forecast: Economic affairs secretary Ajay Seth
articles.description: On the sidelines of a finance ministry event, the secretary also said there is no case for revising growth estimates downwards. He said inflation should moderate soon and that the government is well-prepared for any shock.
articles.content: New Delhi: The Centre is planning a fresh consultation paper on cryptocurrency soon, though a law on the digital assets is likely to take more time, secretary of economic affairs Ajay Seth has said.… [+2450 chars]

articles.title: Sugar Cosmetics raises $50 million led by L Catterton
articles.description: The beauty brand's current annualised revenue run rate is around Rs 500 crore and that is expected to reach Rs 2,000 crore over the next 24-36 months, the company said earlier.

articles.description: Bharath Ram and Guddeti Bharath Reddy have been elevated as SVPs, while Sharon Pais, who was moved to Myntra as its chief business officer, has been made a VP.

articles.description: Flip through monochrome pictures of actress Shruti Haasan pulling off various goth looks

articles.title: Adani Enterprises has high chance of entering Nifty in next rejig

articles.title: NLSIU gold medallist is state UPSC topper with 31st rank

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Maddur farmer puts up a fight against leopard
articles.description: A farmer escaped a leopard attack in G Hosur village of Maddur taluk in Mandya district on Sunday.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 16 Mangaluru students meet DC over hijab row
articles.description: At least 16 of the 44 Muslim girl students of University College in Mangaluru on Monday urged the Dakshina Kannada deputy commissioner to allow them to wear headscarf in classrooms.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Hospitalisation for Covid in city up 231% in May
articles.description: After two months of quiet, intensive care units at public Covid-19 hospitals in the city have started seeing a slight uptick in admissions. The recent spurt in cases has also prompted private facilities to set aside beds for Covid patients, reports Sumitra De…

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Farmer leader Tikait inked, attacked with mic in B'luru; 3 held
articles.description: A meeting of farmers turned chaotic when two men threw ink on Bharatiya Kisan Union national spokesperson Rakesh Tikait and attacked him with a mike when he was addressing the media in Bengaluru on Monday.

articles.author: Rebecca Samervel
articles.title: Driver convicted for Sakinaka rape-murder
articles.description: Eight months after the brutal rape and murder of a 32-year-old woman inside a tempo in Sakinaka and six months after trial in the case began, a sessions court on Monday convicted a 45-year-old driver of the crime.

articles.author: Nitasha Natu
articles.title: Mum police seek to block 100 ‘rogue’ loan apps
articles.description: The police have put together a list of 100 loan apps and sent them for blocking to national nodal agency CERT-In, in the wake of a stream of complaints about digital lenders blackmailing borrowers.

articles.author: Sandhya Nair
articles.title: Family suicide pact: 6-yr-old dies, mom in hosp, dad disappears
articles.description: A six-year-old girl was found dead and her mother partially conscious in a Mira Road hotel room on Monday. The debt-ridden couple from Vasai's Evershine City, who had lost their jobs and had to sell their flat three months ago, had entered into a suicide pact…

articles.title: 100 KM/घंटे की रफ्तार, दिल्ली में मुसीबत की बरसात, 2 की मौत, जामा मस्जिद का गुंबद गिरा
articles.description: दिल्ली में सोमवार को तेज हवाओं के साथ भारी बारिश हुई। मंगलवार को इसका असर देखने को मिल रहा है। उमस से लोगों को राहत मिलेगी। हालांकि सोमवार को आई आंधी-बारिश ने कई इलाकों में भारी तबाही मचाई है। दो लोगों की जान ले ली। सैकड़ों पेड़ उखड़कर घरों और गाड़ियों पर गिर…

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: After flak for Aryan case, Wankhede sent to Chennai tax wing
articles.description: Sameer Wankhede, the officer who probed the narcotics-related cases against Rhea Chakraborty and Aryan Khan, has been transferred to the Directorate General of Tax Payer Services (DGTS), Chennai as additional commissioner.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 3 parties field candidates for 4th RS seat; JD(S) on back foot
articles.description: Election to the fourth seat of the Rajya Sabha in Karnataka is unlikely to be unopposed with state Congress general secretary Mansoor Ali Khan in the fray now and with BJP fielding Lahar Singh Siroya, a former MLC as its third candidate for the fourth seat.

articles.author: Atmadip Ray
articles.title: RBI hike shows up in loan rates, deposits to take longer
articles.description: The external benchmark-linked framework makes transmission of monetary policy signals automatic in terms of lending rates, but deposit rates are functions of credit demand as well as the prevalent liquidity situation.
articles.content: Lending rates went up immediately following Reserve Bank of Indias 40 basis points repo rate increase but deposit rates remained more or less sticky, and are likely to remain so till the time the mar… [+2318 chars]
